attributes.action: increase the provision of free anti AIDS drugs to Africa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the UK government to increase the quantity of HIV AIDS drugs and condoms,  to African countries where the disease has had its largest impact. Also it is essential that British foreign policy makes clear its position to African leaders that are not adopting  thorough and founded directives on prevention and treatment of the condition.
